File: binary-manifest.json
================
{
  "binaryFiles": {
    "downloads/social": {
      "QnA.PDF": {
        "type": "application/pdf",
        "size": "binary",
        "description": "Q&A document from the RFP process"
      },
      "PUR0424-254.pdf": {
        "type": "application/pdf",
        "size": "binary",
        "description": "Original RFP document"
      },
      "Award_Detail_Spreadsheet.xlsx": {
        "type": "application/vnd.openxmlformats-officedocument.spreadsheetml.sheet",
        "size": "binary",
        "description": "Contract award details"
      }
    },
    "downloads/stickers": {
      "sticker_*.png": {
        "type": "image/png",
        "size": "binary",
        "description": "Sticker designs"
      }
    },
    "images": {
      "*.png": {
        "type": "image/png",
        "size": "binary",
        "description": "Website images"
      }
    }
  },
  "processInstructions": {
    "skipBinaryProcessing": true,
    "includeInManifest": true,
    "preserveMetadata": true
  }
}

================
File: cypress.config.js
================
import { defineConfig } from 'cypress'

export default defineConfig({
  e2e: {
    baseUrl: 'http://localhost:4173', // Vite preview server URL
    setupNodeEvents(on, config) {
      // implement node event listeners here
    },
  },
  viewportWidth: 1280,
  viewportHeight: 720,
  video: false,
  screenshotOnRunFailure: true,
})

================
File: deploy.sh
================
#!/bin/bash

# EyesOffCR.org Deployment Script
# Based on the deflock.me project

# Color codes for output
RED='\033[0;31m'
GREEN='\033[0;32m'
YELLOW='\033[1;33m'
NC='\033[0m' # No Color

# Print colored status messages
print_status() {
    echo -e "${GREEN}[+]${NC} $1"
}

print_error() {
    echo -e "${RED}[!]${NC} $1"
}

print_warning() {
    echo -e "${YELLOW}[*]${NC} $1"
}

# Check if script has sudo privileges
if ! [ $(id -u) = 0 ]; then
    print_error "Please run with sudo"
    exit 1
fi

# Clean any previous builds
print_status "Cleaning previous builds..."
rm -rf dist

# Build the site
print_status "Building site..."
sudo -u $SUDO_USER npm install
sudo -u $SUDO_USER npm run build

if [ $? -ne 0 ]; then
    print_error "Build failed!"
    exit 1
fi

# Build CSS
print_status "Building CSS..."
sudo -u $SUDO_USER npx tailwindcss -i ./src/css/styles.css -o ./dist/assets/main.css

# Show what we're replacing
print_status "Current contents of /var/www/eyesoffcr:"
ls -la /var/www/eyesoffcr/

# Deploy the built site
print_status "Deploying built files..."
rm -rf /var/www/eyesoffcr/*

# Create necessary directories
print_status "Creating deployment directories..."
mkdir -p /var/www/eyesoffcr/assets
mkdir -p /var/www/eyesoffcr/src
mkdir -p /var/www/eyesoffcr/blog

# Copy the main site files and assets
print_status "Copying main site files and assets..."
cp -r dist/* /var/www/eyesoffcr/

# Copy HTML files from root
print_status "Copying HTML files..."
cp *.html /var/www/eyesoffcr/

# Copy source files for development mode
print_status "Copying source files..."
cp -r src/* /var/www/eyesoffcr/src/

# Copy the blog files
print_status "Copying blog files..."
cp -r blog/* /var/www/eyesoffcr/blog/ 2>/dev/null || true

# Copy additional resources
print_status "Copying additional resources..."
cp -r downloads /var/www/eyesoffcr/

# Set permissions
print_status "Setting permissions..."
chown -R www-data:www-data /var/www/eyesoffcr
chmod -R 755 /var/www/eyesoffcr

print_status "Done! Current contents of /var/www/eyesoffcr:"
ls -la /var/www/eyesoffcr/

print_status "Verifying deployment..."
if [ ! -f "/var/www/eyesoffcr/assets/main.css" ]; then
    print_error "CSS file missing in deployment!"
    exit 1
fi

print_status "Deployment complete!"
print_warning "Don't forget to verify the site is working at https://eyesoffcr.org"
print_warning "Check that the blog is accessible at https://eyesoffcr.org/blog/"

================
File: index.html
================
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en" class="scroll-smooth">
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
    <title>EyesOffCR.org - Protect Cedar Rapids from Mass Surveillance</title>
    <meta name="description" content="Learn about the dangers of mass surveillance technologies and ALPRs in Cedar Rapids, Iowa.">
    <link href="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Inter:wght@400;600&family=Montserrat:wght@700;800&display=swap" rel="stylesheet">
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="/src/css/main.css">
    <style>
        /* Ensure content is always visible and background is black */
        body, section {
            opacity: 1 !important;
            visibility: visible !important;
            background-color: #000000 !important;
        }
        
        /* Override any other background colors */
        .highlight-section {
            background-color: #000000 !important;
        }
        
        .bg-white\/10 {
            background-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5) !important;
        }
        
        .bg-black\/30, .bg-black\/20 {
            background-color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1) !important;
        }
    </style>
</head>
<body class="bg-black text-white">
    <!-- Navigation -->
    <nav class="bg-black py-4 sticky top-0 z-50 shadow-lg">
        <div class="container mx-auto px-4">
            <div class="flex justify-between items-center">
                <!-- Logo -->
                <a href="#" class="flex items-center">
                    <img src="/images/logo-trans.png" alt="EyesOffCR.org Logo" class="h-10 w-auto" />
                </a>
                
                <!-- Navigation Links -->
                <div class="hidden md:flex space-x-8">
                    <a href="#learn-more" class="text-white hover:text-secondary transition-colors">Learn More</a>
                    <a href="#camera-map" class="text-white hover:text-secondary transition-colors">Camera Map</a>
                    <a href="#transparency" class="text-white hover:text-secondary transition-colors">Transparency</a>
                    <a href="#take-action" class="text-white hover:text-secondary transition-colors">Take Action</a>
                    <a href="#sources" class="text-white hover:text-secondary transition-colors">Sources</a>
                    <a href="/blog/" class="text-white hover:text-secondary transition-colors">Blog</a>
                    <a href="/about.html" class="text-white hover:text-secondary transition-colors">About</a>
                </div>

                <!-- Mobile Menu Button -->
                <button class="md:hidden text-white hover:text-secondary" id="mobile-menu-button">
                    <svg class="w-6 h-6" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 24 24">
                        <path stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" stroke-width="2" d="M4 6h16M4 12h16M4 18h16"></path>
                    </svg>
                </button>
            </div>

            <!-- Mobile Menu -->
            <div class="md:hidden hidden" id="mobile-menu">
                <div class="px-2 pt-2 pb-3 space-y-1">
                    <a href="#learn-more" class="block px-3 py-2 text-white hover:text-secondary transition-colors">Learn More</a>
                    <a href="#camera-map" class="block px-3 py-2 text-white hover:text-secondary transition-colors">Camera Map</a>
                    <a href="#transparency" class="block px-3 py-2 text-white hover:text-secondary transition-colors">Transparency</a>
                    <a href="#take-action" class="block px-3 py-2 text-white hover:text-secondary transition-colors">Take Action</a>
                    <a href="#sources" class="block px-3 py-2 text-white hover:text-secondary transition-colors">Sources</a>
                    <a href="/blog/" class="block px-3 py-2 text-white hover:text-secondary transition-colors">Blog</a>
                    <a href="/about.html" class="block px-3 py-2 text-white hover:text-secondary transition-colors">About</a>
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>
    </nav>

    <!-- Add this script right before the closing body tag -->
    <script>
        // Mobile menu toggle
        const mobileMenuButton = document.getElementById('mobile-menu-button');
        const mobileMenu = document.getElementById('mobile-menu');

        mobileMenuButton.addEventListener('click', () => {
            mobileMenu.classList.toggle('hidden');
        });

        // Close mobile menu when clicking a link
        const mobileLinks = mobileMenu.querySelectorAll('a');
        mobileLinks.forEach(link => {
            link.addEventListener('click', () => {
                mobileMenu.classList.add('hidden');
            });
        });
    </script>

    <!-- Hero Section -->
    <section id="hero" class="hero">
        <div class="section-content">
            <img src="/images/logo-trans.png" alt="EyesOffCR.org Logo" class="w-64 md:w-96 h-auto mx-auto mb-6" />
            <h1 class="text-5xl md:text-7xl font-bold text-secondary mb-4">
                Track Flock Surveillance in Cedar Rapids
            </h1>
            <p class="text-lg md:text-2xl mb-6">
                Mapping Flock's ALPR cameras and demanding transparency about how they track our community.
            </p>
            <div class="flex flex-col md:flex-row gap-4 justify-center">
                <a href="#camera-map" class="action-button bg-secondary">
                    View Camera Map
                </a>
                <a href="#transparency" class="action-button bg-white/10">
                    Transparency Portal
                </a>
            </div>
        </div>
    </section>

    <!-- Introduction Section -->
    <section id="learn-more" class="section">
        <div class="section-content">
            <h2 class="section-header">What Are Flock ALPR Cameras?</h2>
            <p class="text-lg mb-6">
                In March 2024, Cedar Rapids approved a $499,250 contract with Flock Safety to install automated license plate readers throughout our city.
            </p>

            <!-- Add Camera Image -->
            <div class="bg-black/30 p-6 rounded-lg mb-8">
                <div class="grid md:grid-cols-2 gap-8 items-center">
                    <div>
                        <h3 class="text-xl font-bold mb-4 text-secondary">Know What to Look For</h3>
                        <p class="mb-4">Flock cameras are typically mounted on poles and look like this:</p>
                        <ul class="space-y-2">
                            <li>• Usually mounted 10-14 feet high</li>
                            <li>• Solar panel on top</li>
                            <li>• Black camera housing</li>
                            <li>• Often near intersections or major roads</li>
                        </ul>
                    </div>
                    <div class="flex justify-center">
                        <img src="/images/flock.png" 
                             alt="Flock ALPR Camera" 
                             class="rounded-lg max-h-[300px] w-auto shadow-lg"
                             title="Example of a Flock ALPR camera installation" />
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>

            <div class="grid md:grid-cols-2 gap-8">
                <div class="bg-white/10 p-6 rounded-lg">
                    <h3 class="text-xl font-bold mb-4 text-secondary">What They Collect</h3>
                    <ul class="space-y-3">
                        <li>• Photograph every passing vehicle</li>
                        <li>• Record license plates, vehicle details, and location</li>
                        <li>• Track movement patterns across the city</li>
                        <li>• Store data for extended periods</li>
                    </ul>
                </div>
                <div class="bg-white/10 p-6 rounded-lg">
                    <h3 class="text-xl font-bold mb-4 text-secondary">Why It Matters</h3>
                    <ul class="space-y-3">
                        <li>• No public oversight of data collection</li>
                        <li>• History of misuse in other cities</li>
                        <li>• Disproportionate impact on communities of color</li>
                        <li>• No proven impact on public safety</li>
                    </ul>
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>
    </section>

    <!-- Camera Map Section -->
    <section id="camera-map" class="section highlight-section">
        <div class="section-content">
            <h2 class="section-header">Cedar Rapids ALPR Camera Map</h2>
            <div class="bg-black/30 p-8 rounded-lg">
                <div class="mb-6 text-center">
                    <p class="text-lg mb-4">
                        Cedar Rapids plans to deploy Flock Safety ALPR cameras throughout the city. Unlike Oak Park, IL and other cities, 
                        Cedar Rapids has not provided a public map of camera locations or a transparency portal.
                    </p>
                    <a href="https://transparency.flocksafety.com/oak-park-il-pd" 
                       target="_blank" 
                       class="inline-block px-6 py-2 bg-secondary text-black font-bold rounded-lg mb-8">
                        View Oak Park's Transparency Portal
                    </a>
                </div>

                <div class="grid md:grid-cols-2 gap-8 mb-8">
                    <div class="bg-black/20 p-6 rounded-lg">
                        <h3 class="text-xl font-bold mb-4 text-secondary">What Oak Park Shows</h3>
                        <ul class="space-y-3">
                            <li>• Exact camera locations on public map</li>
                            <li>• Monthly search statistics</li>
                            <li>• Reason for each search</li>
                            <li>• Hot list source tracking</li>
                            <li>• Data sharing agreements</li>
                            <li>• Authorized user list</li>
                        </ul>
                    </div>
                    <div class="bg-black/20 p-6 rounded-lg">
                        <h3 class="text-xl font-bold mb-4 text-secondary">What Cedar Rapids Hides</h3>
                        <ul class="space-y-3">
                            <li>• No public camera location map</li>
                            <li>• No search transparency</li>
                            <li>• No data sharing disclosure</li>
                            <li>• No user accountability</li>
                            <li>• No community oversight</li>
                            <li>• No impact reporting</li>
                        </ul>
                    </div>
                </div>

                <div class="aspect-w-16 aspect-h-9 mb-6">
                    <iframe 
                        src="https://deflock.me/map#map=12/41.980805/-91.661339"
                        class="w-full h-[600px] rounded-lg"
                        allowfullscreen>
                    </iframe>
                </div>
                
                <div class="grid md:grid-cols-2 gap-8 mt-8">
                    <div>
                        <h3 class="text-xl font-bold mb-4 text-secondary">Community Camera Tracking</h3>
                        <p class="mb-4">Help us create the transparency our city won't provide. Report Flock camera locations:</p>
                        <ul class="space-y-2">
                            <li>• Include cross streets or GPS coordinates</li>
                            <li>• Note installation date if known</li>
                            <li>• Describe camera mounting (pole type, height)</li>
                            <li>• Submit photos if possible</li>
                        </ul>
                        <a href="#" class="contact-email inline-block mt-4 px-6 py-2 bg-secondary text-black font-bold rounded-lg">
                            Submit Camera Location
                        </a>
                    </div>
                    <div>
                        <h3 class="text-xl font-bold mb-4 text-secondary">Current Status</h3>
                        <div class="space-y-4">
                            <div class="bg-black/20 p-4 rounded-lg">
                                <div class="text-3xl font-bold text-secondary">Unknown</div>
                                <div class="text-sm">Number of Cameras</div>
                            </div>
                            <div class="bg-black/20 p-4 rounded-lg">
                                <div class="text-3xl font-bold text-secondary">March 2024</div>
                                <div class="text-sm">Contract Approved</div>
                            </div>
                            <div class="bg-black/20 p-4 rounded-lg">
                                <div class="text-3xl font-bold text-secondary">$499,250</div>
                                <div class="text-sm">Two-Year Cost</div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>
    </section>

    <!-- Transparency Portal Section -->
    <section id="transparency" class="section">
        <div class="section-content">
            <h2 class="section-header">Demand a Real Transparency Portal</h2>
            <div class="bg-black/30 p-8 rounded-lg">
                <div class="mb-8">
                    <div class="grid md:grid-cols-2 gap-8 mb-8">
                        <div>
                            <h3 class="text-xl font-bold mb-4 text-secondary">Oak Park's Portal Shows:</h3>
                            <div class="bg-black/20 p-6 rounded-lg">
                                <ul class="space-y-3">
                                    <li>• Total vehicles scanned</li>
                                    <li>• Monthly searches performed</li>
                                    <li>• Search reasons breakdown</li>
                                    <li>• Data sharing agreements</li>
                                    <li>• Authorized user list</li>
                                    <li>• Camera locations map</li>
                                </ul>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div>
                            <h3 class="text-xl font-bold mb-4 text-secondary">Cedar Rapids Should Show:</h3>
                            <div class="bg-black/20 p-6 rounded-lg">
                                <ul class="space-y-3">
                                    <li>• Real-time scanning statistics</li>
                                    <li>• Monthly transparency reports</li>
                                    <li>• Search audit logs</li>
                                    <li>• Data retention compliance</li>
                                    <li>• Agency access list</li>
                                    <li>• Public camera map</li>
                                </ul>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                </div>

                <div class="grid md:grid-cols-3 gap-6">
                    <div class="bg-black/20 p-6 rounded-lg">
                        <h3 class="text-xl font-bold mb-4 text-secondary">Usage Stats</h3>
                        <ul class="space-y-2">
                            <li>• Total scans per camera</li>
                            <li>• Search frequency</li>
                            <li>• Hit/miss rates</li>
                            <li>• Search reasons</li>
                            <li>• Outcome tracking</li>
                        </ul>
                    </div>
                    <div class="bg-black/20 p-6 rounded-lg">
                        <h3 class="text-xl font-bold mb-4 text-secondary">Access Logs</h3>
                        <ul class="space-y-2">
                            <li>• Officer name/badge</li>
                            <li>• Search timestamp</li>
                            <li>• Reason for search</li>
                            <li>• Case number</li>
                            <li>• Results shared</li>
                        </ul>
                    </div>
                    <div class="bg-black/20 p-6 rounded-lg">
                        <h3 class="text-xl font-bold mb-4 text-secondary">Oversight</h3>
                        <ul class="space-y-2">
                            <li>• Monthly audits</li>
                            <li>• Policy compliance</li>
                            <li>• Error reporting</li>
                            <li>• Misuse tracking</li>
                            <li>• Impact analysis</li>
                        </ul>
                    </div>
                </div>

                <div class="mt-8 text-center">
                    <p class="text-lg mb-4">Oak Park shows what real transparency looks like. Will Cedar Rapids do the same?</p>
                    <a href="#take-action" class="inline-block px-8 py-3 bg-secondary text-black font-bold rounded-lg">
                        Demand Transparency
                    </a>
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>
    </section>

    <!-- Take Action Section -->
    <section id="take-action" class="section highlight-section">
        <div class="section-content text-center">
            <h2 class="section-header">Take Action</h2>
            <div class="bg-black/30 p-8 rounded-lg">
                <p class="text-xl mb-8">
                    Join us in demanding transparency and accountability for surveillance technology in Cedar Rapids.
                </p>
                <div class="grid md:grid-cols-3 gap-8">
                    <div class="bg-black/20 p-6 rounded-lg">
                        <h3 class="text-xl font-bold mb-4 text-secondary">Contact Council</h3>
                        <p class="mb-4">Tell city leaders we need transparency about how Flock cameras are used.</p>
                        <a href="https://www.cedar-rapids.org/local_government/city_council/mayor_and_city_council/index.php" 
                           target="_blank" 
                           class="inline-block px-6 py-2 bg-secondary text-black font-bold rounded-lg">
                            Contact Leaders
                        </a>
                    </div>
                    <div class="bg-black/20 p-6 rounded-lg">
                        <h3 class="text-xl font-bold mb-4 text-secondary">Spread the Word</h3>
                        <p class="mb-4">Share information about Flock surveillance with your neighbors.</p>
                        <a href="/media_package.html" 
                           class="inline-block px-6 py-2 bg-secondary text-black font-bold rounded-lg">
                            Get Resources
                        </a>
                    </div>
                    <div class="bg-black/20 p-6 rounded-lg">
                        <h3 class="text-xl font-bold mb-4 text-secondary">Get Updates</h3>
                        <p class="mb-4">Stay informed about surveillance in Cedar Rapids.</p>
                        <a href="https://www.instagram.com/eyesoffcr/" 
                           target="_blank"
                           class="inline-block px-6 py-2 bg-secondary text-black font-bold rounded-lg">
                            Follow Updates
                        </a>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>
    </section>

    <!-- Sources Section -->
    <section id="sources" class="section">
        <div class="section-content">
            <h2 class="section-header">Sources and Info</h2>
            <div class="space-y-6">
                <div>
                    <h3 class="text-xl font-bold mb-3">News Coverage</h3>
                    <ul class="space-y-2">
                        <li>
                            <a href="https://www.kcrg.com/2025/01/10/cedar-rapids-police-expanding-use-automated-license-plate-readers/" target="_blank" class="text-secondary hover:underline">
                                KCRG: Cedar Rapids police expanding use of Automated License Plate Readers (Jan 2025)
                            </a>
                        </li>
                    </ul>
                </div>
                <div>
                    <h3 class="text-xl font-bold mb-3">Research & Studies</h3>
                    <ul class="space-y-2">
                        <li>
                            <a href="https://link.springer.com/article/10.1007/s11292-011-9133-9" target="_blank" class="text-secondary hover:underline">
                                Journal of Experimental Criminology: No deterrent effect from ALPR patrols in crime hot spots
                            </a>
                        </li>
                        <li>
                            <a href="https://www.eff.org/deeplinks/2015/01/what-we-learned-oakland-raw-alpr-data" target="_blank" class="text-secondary hover:underline">
                                EFF Study: ALPRs disproportionately deployed in communities of color
                            </a>
                        </li>
                        <li>
                            <a href="https://www.freedomtothriveop.com/blog/zine-analyzes-flock-alpr-cameras-in-oak-park-il" target="_blank" class="text-secondary hover:underline">
                                Oak Park Study: 84% of ALPR-initiated stops targeted Black drivers
                            </a>
                        </li>
                    </ul>
                </div>
                <div>
                    <h3 class="text-xl font-bold mb-3">Security Concerns</h3>
                    <ul class="space-y-2">
                        <li>
                            <a href="https://www.404media.co/researcher-turns-insecure-license-plate-cameras-into-open-source-surveillance-tool/" target="_blank" class="text-secondary hover:underline">
                                Critical Security Flaw Found in Motorola ALPR System (2025)
                            </a>
                        </li>
                        <li>
                            <a href="https://www.aclu.org/blog/privacy-technology/location-tracking/san-francisco-woman-pulled-out-car-gunpoint-because" target="_blank" class="text-secondary hover:underline">
                                ACLU: San Francisco Woman Pulled Out of Car at Gunpoint Due to ALPR Error
                            </a>
                        </li>
                    </ul>
                </div>
                <div>
                    <h3 class="text-xl font-bold mb-3">Documented Abuse</h3>
                    <ul class="space-y-2">
                        <li>
                            <a href="https://www.kwch.com/2022/10/31/kechi-police-lieutenant-arrested-using-police-technology-stalk-wife/" target="_blank" class="text-secondary hover:underline">
                                Police Officer Used Flock ALPRs to Stalk Estranged Wife
                            </a>
                        </li>
                        <li>
                            <a href="https://inewsource.org/2022/01/06/police-share-license-plate-data/" target="_blank" class="text-secondary hover:underline">
                                Police Breaking the Law by Sharing Drivers' Data
                            </a>
                        </li>
                        <li>
                            <a href="https://www.latimes.com/business/technology/story/2020-12-21/pasadena-long-beach-police-ice-automated-license-plate-reader-data" target="_blank" class="text-secondary hover:underline">
                                Police Sharing ALPR Data with ICE Despite Legal Prohibitions
                            </a>
                        </li>
                    </ul>
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>
    </section>

    <!-- Footer -->
    <footer class="section bg-primary text-center">
        <div class="section-content">
            <img src="/images/logo-trans.png" alt="EyesOffCR.org Logo" class="w-48 h-auto mx-auto mb-4" />
            <p class="text-sm mb-2">Contact us: <a href="#" class="contact-email show-email text-secondary">Contact Us</a></p>
            <p class="text-sm opacity-75">© 2024 EyesOffCR.org. All rights reserved.</p>
        </div>
    </footer>
</body>
</html>

================
File: media_package.html
================

<html lang="en" class="scroll-smooth">
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
    <title>Media Package - EyesOffCR.org</title>
    <meta name="description" content="Download media resources about ALPR surveillance in Cedar Rapids, Iowa.">
    <link href="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Inter:wght@400;600&family=Montserrat:wght@700;800&display=swap" rel="stylesheet">
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="/src/css/main.css">
    <script type="module" src="/src/js/main.js"></script>
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/photoswipe@5.3.8/dist/photoswipe.css">
    <style>
        /* Ensure content is always visible and background is black */
        body, section {
            opacity: 1 !important;
            visibility: visible !important;
            background-color: #000000 !important;
        }
        
        /* Override any other background colors */
        .highlight-section {
            background-color: #000000 !important;
        }
        
        .bg-white\/10 {
            background-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5) !important;
        }
        
        .bg-black\/30, .bg-black\/20 {
            background-color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1) !important;
        }

        .download-card {
            @apply bg-black/30 p-6 rounded-lg transition-transform duration-300 hover:scale-105;
        }

        .download-button {
            display: block;
            width: 100%;
            padding: 0.75rem 1rem;
            background-color: #f59e0b;
            color: black;
            font-weight: bold;
            border-radius: 0.375rem;
            text-align: center;
            transition: background-color 0.2s;
            /* Make touch target larger on mobile */
            min-height: 44px;
            font-size: clamp(0.875rem, 2vw, 1rem);
        }

        .gallery-grid {
            display: grid;
            /* Adjust grid for smaller screens */
            grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fill, minmax(280px, 1fr));
            gap: 1.5rem;
            padding: 0.5rem;
            margin: 0 auto;
            max-width: 100%;
        }

        .gallery-item {
            position: relative;
            background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1);
            border-radius: 0.5rem;
            overflow: hidden;
            transition: transform 0.2s;
            /* Prevent horizontal scrolling on mobile */
            max-width: 100%;
            margin: 0 auto;
        }

        .gallery-item:hover {
            transform: scale(1.02);
        }

        .gallery-item img {
            width: 100%;
            /* Adjust height for better mobile viewing */
            height: 180px;
            object-fit: cover;
            border-radius: 0.5rem 0.5rem 0 0;
        }

        .gallery-item-info {
            padding: 1rem;
            background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.8);
        }

        .gallery-item-title {
            font-weight: bold;
            margin-bottom: 0.5rem;
            color: #fff;
            /* Adjust font size for mobile */
            font-size: clamp(1rem, 2.5vw, 1.25rem);
        }

        .gallery-item-desc {
            /* Adjust font size for mobile */
            font-size: clamp(0.875rem, 2vw, 1rem);
            color: #ccc;
            margin-bottom: 1rem;
            line-height: 1.4;
        }

        .category-header {
            background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1);
            padding: 1rem;
            margin: 1.5rem 0.5rem;
            border-radius: 0.5rem;
            color: #f59e0b;
            /* Adjust font size for mobile */
            font-size: clamp(1.25rem, 3vw, 1.5rem);
        }

        .pswp {
            --pswp-bg: #000;
        }

        /* Add responsive container padding */
        .max-w-7xl {
            padding-left: max(1rem, env(safe-area-inset-left));
            padding-right: max(1rem, env(safe-area-inset-right));
        }

        /* Optimize header text for mobile */
        .section-content h1 {
            font-size: clamp(2rem, 5vw, 3.5rem);
            line-height: 1.2;
            margin-bottom: 1rem;
        }

        .section-content p {
            font-size: clamp(1rem, 2.5vw, 1.25rem);
            line-height: 1.5;
            margin-bottom: 1.5rem;
        }

        /* Add better touch targets for mobile navigation */
        .md\:flex a {
            padding: 0.5rem;
            margin: 0 0.5rem;
        }

        /* Ensure PhotoSwipe controls are touch-friendly */
        .pswp__button {
            min-width: 44px;
            min-height: 44px;
        }

        /* Add safe area insets for modern mobile browsers */
        @supports(padding: max(0px)) {
            body {
                padding-left: min(0vmin, env(safe-area-inset-left));
                padding-right: min(0vmin, env(safe-area-inset-right));
                padding-bottom: min(0vmin, env(safe-area-inset-bottom));
            }
        }

        .swiper {
            width: 100%;
            padding: 20px 0;
        }

        .swiper-slide {
            width: 280px;
            margin-right: 20px;
        }

        .swiper-button-next,
        .swiper-button-prev {
            color: #f59e0b !important;
        }

        .swiper-pagination-bullet {
            background: #f59e0b !important;
        }

        .meme-gallery {
            background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.05);
            padding: 20px;
            border-radius: 0.5rem;
            margin: 2rem 0;
        }

        .meme-header {
            color: #f59e0b;
            font-size: 1.25rem;
            font-weight: bold;
            margin-bottom: 1rem;
            padding: 0 1rem;
        }

        @media (max-width: 640px) {
            .swiper-button-next,
            .swiper-button-prev {
                display: none !important;
            }
        }
    </style>
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/swiper@11/swiper-bundle.min.css" />
</head>
<body class="bg-primary text-white">
    <!-- Navigation -->
    <nav class="bg-primary py-4 sticky top-0 z-50 shadow-lg">
        <div class="container mx-auto px-4">
            <div class="flex justify-between items-center">
                <!-- Logo -->
                <a href="/" class="flex items-center">
                    <img src="/images/logo-trans.png" alt="EyesOffCR.org Logo" class="h-10 w-auto" />
                </a>
                
                <!-- Navigation Links -->
                <div class="hidden md:flex space-x-8">
                    <a href="/#learn-more" class="text-white hover:text-secondary transition-colors">Learn More</a>
                    <a href="/#what-is-flock" class="text-white hover:text-secondary transition-colors">About ALPRs</a>
                    <a href="/#dangers" class="text-white hover:text-secondary transition-colors">Dangers</a>
                    <a href="/#sources" class="text-white hover:text-secondary transition-colors">Sources</a>
                    <a href="/#take-action" class="text-white hover:text-secondary transition-colors">Take Action</a>
                    <a href="/about.html" class="text-white hover:text-secondary transition-colors">About</a>
                </div>

                <!-- Mobile Menu Button -->
                <button class="md:hidden text-white hover:text-secondary" id="mobile-menu-button">
                    <svg class="w-6 h-6" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 24 24">
                        <path stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" stroke-width="2" d="M4 6h16M4 12h16M4 18h16"></path>
                    </svg>
                </button>
            </div>

            <!-- Mobile Menu -->
            <div class="md:hidden hidden" id="mobile-menu">
                <div class="px-2 pt-2 pb-3 space-y-1">
                    <a href="/#learn-more" class="block px-3 py-2 text-white hover:text-secondary transition-colors">Learn More</a>
                    <a href="/#what-is-flock" class="block px-3 py-2 text-white hover:text-secondary transition-colors">About ALPRs</a>
                    <a href="/#dangers" class="block px-3 py-2 text-white hover:text-secondary transition-colors">Dangers</a>
                    <a href="/#sources" class="block px-3 py-2 text-white hover:text-secondary transition-colors">Sources</a>
                    <a href="/#take-action" class="block px-3 py-2 text-white hover:text-secondary transition-colors">Take Action</a>
                    <a href="/about.html" class="block px-3 py-2 text-white hover:text-secondary transition-colors">About</a>
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>
    </nav>

    <!-- Header Section -->
    <section class="section">
        <div class="section-content text-center">
            <h1 class="text-5xl md:text-6xl font-bold text-secondary mb-6">
                Media Package
            </h1>
            <p class="text-lg md:text-xl mb-8">
                Download ready-to-use materials to help spread awareness about Flock surveillance in Cedar Rapids
            </p>
        </div>
    </section>

    <!-- Main Gallery -->
    <div class="max-w-7xl mx-auto px-4">
        <!-- Flyers Section -->
        <h2 class="category-header text-2xl font-bold">Flyers & Handouts</h2>
        <div class="gallery-grid" id="flyers-gallery">
            <div class="gallery-item">
                <a href="/downloads/flyers/EyesOfCR_WeWatch_Color_.png" 
                   data-pswp-width="1200" 
                   data-pswp-height="800">
                    <img src="/downloads/flyers/EyesOfCR_WeWatch_Color_.png" 
                         alt="We Watch The Watchers - Color"/>
                </a>
                <div class="gallery-item-info">
                    <div class="gallery-item-title">Color Version</div>
                    <div class="gallery-item-desc">High-quality color version for professional printing</div>
                    <a href="/downloads/flyers/EyesOfCR_WeWatch_Color_.png" 
                       download 
                       class="download-button">
                        Download
                    </a>
                </div>
            </div>
            
            <div class="gallery-item">
                <a href="/downloads/flyers/EyesOfCR_WeWatch_Color__black_and_white.png"
                   data-pswp-width="1200" 
                   data-pswp-height="800">
                    <img src="/downloads/flyers/EyesOfCR_WeWatch_Color__black_and_white.png" 
                         alt="We Watch The Watchers - B&W"/>
                </a>
                <div class="gallery-item-info">
                    <div class="gallery-item-title">B&W Version</div>
                    <div class="gallery-item-desc">Optimized for office printing and photocopying</div>
                    <a href="/downloads/flyers/EyesOfCR_WeWatch_Color__black_and_white.png" 
                       download 
                       class="download-button">
                        Download
                    </a>
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>

                <h3 class="text-xl font-bold mb-2">Request for Proposal (RFP)</h3>

    <!-- Usage Guidelines -->
    <section class="section">
        <div class="section-content">
            <h2 class="section-header">Media Guidelines</h2>
            <div class="bg-black/30 p-8 rounded-lg">
                <p class="text-lg mb-6">
                    All materials are free to use and modify for non-commercial purposes in spreading awareness about surveillance in Cedar Rapids. Please credit EyesOffCR.org when possible.
                </p>
                <p class="text-lg mb-6">
                    For questions about usage or to request custom materials, contact us at <a href="#" class="contact-email show-email text-secondary">Contact Us</a>
                </p>
                <div class="bg-black/20 p-6 rounded-lg mt-6">
                    <h3 class="text-xl font-bold mb-4 text-secondary">Printing Tips</h3>
                    <ul class="space-y-2">
                        <li>• For best results, use the CMYK versions for professional printing</li>
                        <li>• RGB versions are optimized for home/office printing</li>
                        <li>• Black & white versions are provided for economical printing</li>
                    </ul>
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>
    </section>

    <!-- Attribution Section -->
    <section class="section highlight-section">
        <div class="section-content text-center">
            <div class="bg-black/30 p-8 rounded-lg">
                <h2 class="text-2xl font-bold mb-4 text-secondary">About This Project</h2>
                <p class="text-lg mb-4">
                    EyesOffCR.org is based on the <a href="https://deflock.me" target="_blank" class="text-secondary hover:underline">deflock.me</a> project, 
                    a community initiative to track and resist Flock surveillance systems.
                </p>
                <p class="text-lg">
                    We're part of a growing network of communities working to protect privacy and civil liberties from mass surveillance.
                </p>
            </div>
        </div>
    </section>

    <footer class="section bg-primary text-center">
        <div class="section-content">
            <img src="/images/logo-trans.png" alt="EyesOffCR.org Logo" class="w-48 h-auto mx-auto mb-4" />
            <div class="flex justify-center items-center space-x-4 mb-4">
                <a href="https://www.instagram.com/eyesoffcr/" target="_blank" class="text-secondary hover:text-secondary/80 transition-colors">
                    <svg class="w-6 h-6" fill="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 24 24" aria-hidden="true">
                        <path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M12.315 2c2.43 0 2.784.013 3.808.06 1.064.049 1.791.218 2.427.465a4.902 4.902 0 011.772 1.153 4.902 4.902 0 011.153 1.772c.247.636.416 1.363.465 2.427.048 1.067.06 1.407.06 4.123v.08c0 2.643-.012 2.987-.06 4.043-.049 1.064-.218 1.791-.465 2.427a4.902 4.902 0 01-1.153 1.772 4.902 4.902 0 01-1.772 1.153c-.636.247-1.363.416-2.427.465-1.067.048-1.407.06-4.123.06h-.08c-2.643 0-2.987-.012-4.043-.06-1.064-.049-1.791-.218-2.427-.465a4.902 4.902 0 01-1.772-1.153 4.902 4.902 0 01-1.153-1.772c-.247-.636-.416-1.363-.465-2.427-.047-1.024-.06-1.379-.06-3.808v-.63c0-2.43.013-2.784.06-3.808.049-1.064.218-1.791.465-2.427a4.902 4.902 0 011.153-1.772A4.902 4.902 0 015.45 2.525c.636-.247 1.363-.416 2.427-.465C8.901 2.013 9.256 2 11.685 2h.63zm-.081 1.802h-.468c-2.456 0-2.784.011-3.807.058-.975.045-1.504.207-1.857.344-.467.182-.8.398-1.15.748-.35.35-.566.683-.748 1.15-.137.353-.3.882-.344 1.857-.047 1.023-.058 1.351-.058 3.807v.468c0 2.456.011 2.784.058 3.807.045.975.207 1.504.344 1.857.182.466.399.8.748 1.15.35.35.683.566 1.15.748.353.137.882.3 1.857.344 1.054.048 1.37.058 4.041.058h.08c2.597 0 2.917-.01 3.96-.058.976-.045 1.505-.207 1.858-.344.466-.182.8-.398 1.15-.748.35-.35.566-.683.748-1.15.137-.353.3-.882.344-1.857.048-1.055.058-1.37.058-4.041v-.08c0-2.597-.01-2.917-.058-3.96-.045-.976-.207-1.505-.344-1.858a3.097 3.097 0 00-.748-1.15 3.098 3.098 0 00-1.15-.748c-.353-.137-.882-.3-1.857-.344-1.023-.047-1.351-.058-3.807-.058zM12 6.865a5.135 5.135 0 110 10.27 5.135 5.135 0 010-10.27zm0 1.802a3.333 3.333 0 100 6.666 3.333 3.333 0 000-6.666zm5.338-3.205a1.2 1.2 0 110 2.4 1.2 1.2 0 010-2.4z" clip-rule="evenodd"></path>
                    </svg>
                </a>
            </div>
            <p class="text-sm mb-2">Contact us: <a href="#" class="contact-email show-email text-secondary">Contact Us</a></p>
            <p class="text-sm opacity-75">© 2024 EyesOffCR.org. All rights reserved.</p>
        </div>
    </footer>

    <!-- PhotoSwipe -->
    <script type="module">
        import PhotoSwipeLightbox from 'https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/photoswipe@5.3.8/dist/photoswipe-lightbox.esm.js'
        import PhotoSwipe from 'https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/photoswipe@5.3.8/dist/photoswipe.esm.js'

        const lightbox = new PhotoSwipeLightbox({
            gallery: '.gallery-grid',
            children: 'a',
            pswpModule: PhotoSwipe
        });

        lightbox.init();
    </script>

    <!-- Mobile Menu Script -->
    <script>
        const mobileMenuButton = document.getElementById('mobile-menu-button');
        const mobileMenu = document.getElementById('mobile-menu');

        mobileMenuButton.addEventListener('click', () => {
            mobileMenu.classList.toggle('hidden');
        });

        const mobileLinks = mobileMenu.querySelectorAll('a');
        mobileLinks.forEach(link => {
            link.addEventListener('click', () => {
                mobileMenu.classList.add('hidden');
            });
        });
    </script>

    <!-- Add Swiper JS before the closing body tag -->
    <script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/swiper@11/swiper-bundle.min.js"></script>
    <script>
        const swiper = new Swiper('.meme-swiper', {
            slidesPerView: 'auto',
            spaceBetween: 20,
            grabCursor: true,
            pagination: {
                el: '.swiper-pagination',
                clickable: true,
            },
            navigation: {
                nextEl: '.swiper-button-next',
                prevEl: '.swiper-button-prev',
            },
        });
    </script>
</body>
</html>

================
File: package.json
================
{
  "name": "eyesoffcr",
  "version": "1.0.0",
  "type": "module",
  "description": "Static informational website about surveillance in Cedar Rapids",
  "scripts": {
    "clean": "rm -rf dist",
    "build:css": "tailwindcss -i ./src/css/styles.css -o ./src/css/main.css",
    "prebuild": "npm run clean && mkdir -p dist/assets",
    "build": "npm run build:css && vite build",
    "preview": "vite preview",
    "test": "npm run test:e2e && npm run test:a11y && npm run test:html",
    "test:e2e": "xvfb-run -a cypress run",
    "test:e2e:open": "cypress open",
    "test:a11y": "pa11y-ci ./index.html ./about.html ./media_package.html",
    "test:html": "html-validate ./index.html ./about.html ./media_package.html"
  },
  "devDependencies": {
    "axe-core": "^4.8.3",
    "cypress": "^13.6.4",
    "cypress-axe": "^1.5.0",
    "html-validate": "^8.9.1",
    "pa11y-ci": "^3.1.0",
    "tailwindcss": "^3.4.1",
    "vite": "^5.1.4"
  },
  "dependencies": {
    "repomix": "^0.2.26"
  }
}

================
File: README.md
================
# EyesOffCR.org

A static informational website raising awareness about mass surveillance technologies, particularly Automated License Plate Readers (ALPRs), in Cedar Rapids, Iowa.

## Project Overview

This website is built using:
- HTML5
- Tailwind CSS for styling
- Minimal JavaScript for smooth scrolling
- SVG icons for visual elements

## Development Setup

1. Install dependencies:
```bash
npm install
```

2. Start the development server:
```bash
npm run dev
```

3. Build for production:
```bash
npm run build
```

## Project Structure

- `index.html` - Main webpage content
- `tailwind.config.js` - Tailwind CSS configuration
- `src/css/styles.css` - Custom CSS styles
- `src/js/main.js` - JavaScript functionality
- `public/` - Static assets (images, icons)

## License

Copyright © 2024 EyesOffCR.org. All rights reserved.

================
File: repomix.config.json
================
{
  "version": "1.0",
  "output": {
    "path": "./repomix-output.txt",
    "format": "plain"
  },
  "ignore": {
    "useGitignore": true,
    "useDefaultPatterns": true,
    "customPatterns": [
      "dist/**/*",
      "node_modules/**/*",
      "downloads/social/QnA.PDF",
      "downloads/social/PUR0424-254.pdf",
      "downloads/social/Award_Detail_Spreadsheet.xlsx",
      "**/*.png",
      "**/*.jpg",
      "**/*.jpeg",
      "**/*.gif",
      "**/*.ico"
    ]
  }
}

================
File: tailwind.config.js
================
/** @type {import('tailwindcss').Config} */
export default {
  content: [
    "./index.html",
    "./about.html",
    "./media_package.html",
    "./src/**/*.{js,ts,jsx,tsx}",
  ],
  theme: {
    extend: {
      colors: {
        'primary': '#000000',      // Black
        'secondary': '#FFD700',    // Yellow
        'accent': '#FF0000',       // Red
        'highlight': '#00CED1',    // Teal
      },
      fontFamily: {
        'sans': ['Inter', 'system-ui', 'sans-serif'],
        'display': ['Montserrat', 'system-ui', 'sans-serif'],
      },
      spacing: {
        'section': '4rem',
        'header': '6rem',
      },
    },
  },
  plugins: [],
}

================
File: vite.config.cjs
================
const { defineConfig } = require('vite')

module.exports = defineConfig({
  server: {
    port: 3000,
    open: true
  },
  build: {
    outDir: 'dist',
    assetsDir: 'assets',
    rollupOptions: {
      input: {
        main: './index.html',
        about: './about.html',
        media_package: './media_package.html'
      },
      output: {
        assetFileNames: (assetInfo) => {
          if (assetInfo.name === 'main.css') {
            return 'assets/main.css';
          }
          return 'assets/[name].[hash][extname]';
        }
      }
    }
  },
  css: {
    postcss: {
      plugins: [require('tailwindcss')]
    }
  }
})



================================================================
End of Codebase
================================================================
